Package edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.frontend

Class Summary
BackEndLSPDescriptor Descibes one wrapped subcollection in a SDARTS server configuration.
FrontEndLSP The gateway into the entire SDARTS server - essentially an SDLIP LSP that understands STARTS.
SDARTS The class used as the actual SDARTS server process.
SDARTSConfig The object that SDARTS uses to configure itself upon start-up.
SDARTSConfigBuilder Builds a SDARTSConfig descriptor by reading in XML, in the sdarts_config.xml file, which is in the SDARTS.CONFIG_DIRECTORY directory.
